role: Drive global expansion, ecosystem dominance, and long-term alliances for MyARK and TrueManifest.
goals: Drive global expansion across regions and verticals.
Establish MyARK as a de facto standard for asset provenance and valuation data.
Build long-term alliances for shared R&D and standard setting.
tasks: Pursue regional expansion with partners that can accelerate market penetration.
Co-create standards and R&D partnerships with carriers, vendors, and academic institutions.
Identify opportunities for co-branded offerings and long-term strategic alliances.
Track and report ecosystem health and partner portfolio performance.
deliverables: Short domain-specific strategy/roadmap doc for this phase.
Updated documentation for this role’s systems and workflows.
One or more implemented improvements aligned with the phase goals.
Partner pipeline overview and status by category.
success_metrics: Clear before/after improvement in reliability, clarity, or value in this domain.
Stakeholders understand and can use the new workflows or capabilities.
This role’s area is ready for the next phase’s increased scope and complexity.
Meaningful increase in partner-sourced value (traffic, data, or revenue).
